name: Pobody's Nerfect
description:
A dungeon crawler where it's dangerous to go alone!

Don't get stuck in your own head.

It's ok to get help! Everyone needs it sometimes. Download the Android companion app to get a writeable map with guidance and a bit more structure to this unusual dungeon layout. The program is also available for PC, Mac, or Linux, or downloadable PDF.

WASD or arrows to move

*there is content that could be distressing, please use the map to avoid thinking the negative thoughts*

This dungeon's theme is anxiety, but in the future dungeons could be tailored to fit different disorder's. 

Created in 4 days for GamesAid Mental Health Jam 2020

All assets created by Wander- yo I'm not an artist. 

Please leave a comment on your experience! Help squash bugs!
